treatment-md.title: Parasitorhabditis obtusa Fuchs 1915
treatment-md.article-title: First record of the genus Parasitorhabditis Fuchs, 1937 (Rhabditida, Nematoda) from Iran with notes on morphological and molecular characters of the Iranian population of P. obtusa (Fuchs, 1915) Chitwood & Chitwood, 1950
